title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) (No. 4) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited maritime area planning act 2021 (commencement certain provisions) (no 4) order 2022

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 1st day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 
56 of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 November, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [599] 3
